messages.message: I agree! Can you create a ticket for this as either usability improvement or bug?

hmm you’re saying that the cursor just resets to the start of the input box as you type?

can you record your screen while demo’ing this? this shouldn’t happen :disappointed:

yeah i hear you about showing the dropdown only after the @ symbol

we already have a ticket for this https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2927
Whoops, sorry.  I started creating the ticket before seeing you said we already have a ticket for that.  :upside_down_face:  I'll close out the one that I just created.
already closed and linked the original ticket!
